channel.title: How do i add a command that makes me do an emote?

item.title: How do i add a command that makes me do an emote?
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:3, topic:309638”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command")) { startAnimation("###"); }

Probably something like that

@TimmahPwnz
Yeah, something like that, except he doesn’t want GFX.[/quote]

Yeah Lol Sorry, I Thought They Were The Same Thing?

Offtopic;

BTW Do You Have A Server?
